Description:
Titled land, ready to build
Located in the highly sought after Hartleigh Estate is this 448 square metre piece of titled land, east facing with no easements would be an ideal location for you to build your next dream home. With shopping centre, schools, TAFE college, parks, public transport and all other amenities are only few minutes' drive from this land, it will bring all the comfort and convenience at your door step. As there is a shortage of title blocks these days in the market, this will not last for long
Call now to inspect.

Address: 275 Clyde Five Ways Road Clyde VIC 3978
Description:
A family favourite on approx 2 1/2 Acres
This spacious solid brick home with wrap around verandahs has all the bells and whistles to offer a wonderful lifestyle for the whole family. A 10,000 sqm allotment with 3 paddocks including an orchard, indoors and outdoors offers something for everyone. Whether it's tinkering in the huge man cave, tending to the sheep in the paddocks, pottering in the surrounding gardens with its plethora of fruit trees or watching the children play from the many windows of this property you will embrace your new rural lifestyle yet only minutes from the heart of Cranbourne. Comprising: -
- Entry with double leadlight doors
- Main bedroom with ensuite, spa and lots of built-in robes
- Two further double bedrooms with built-in robes
- Study at the front of the home, ideal for a home office
- Large open plan kitchen with stunning granite benchtops, timber cupboards, double oven, Fisher and Paykel double dishdrawer dishwasher, 6 burner hotplates, walk-in pantry
- Open plan living area with Coonara wood fire
- Separate lounge / dining area with open fire place
- Rumpus room with Red Gum wet bar, loads of cupboards opening to verandah and overlooking the property
- Main bathroom with extra deep soaker bath and frameless shower
- Powder room
- Large laundry
- Large garden shed
- 200 sqm (approx) man cave / shed with roller doors, full entertainment system including Foxtel, fully lined and insulated with kitchen and toilet, hot water & wood fire. Plenty of parking for several cars, boat, trailer
- So many extra features in this property including ducted heating/cooling, 10 kw solar system, solar hot water system, 3 phase power in house and shed, 3 tank sewerage treatment plant with grey water for paddocks, alarm, CCTV cameras (4 on house, 4 on shed) with 30 sec video on the doorbell, attic storage with extension ladder, chook house, sheep pen.
Country living yet only a five minute drive to the heart of Cranbourne, Cranbourne Secondary College, Cranbourne Primary School, St Thomas the Apostle Catholic Primary, Lighthouse Christian College, Casey RACE and all the facilities you'll ever need.
Insights: 275 Clyde Five Ways Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2018 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Approx. 2.5 Acres Land Parcel in approved PSP
Located in the heart of Clyde this ultimate property is well setup and would suit any investor or developer looking to make serious money. The property is located approximately 56 kms kilometres south east of the Melbourne CBD and approx. 8 kms from Cranbourne amenities.
Features include:
Parcel situated in an approved PSP
Part of Proposed major town centre onsite
Spacious 4 bedroom home complete with full ensuite and walk in robe to the master
outdoor living
Swimming Pool
Water tank
Huge Shed
Suitable for lifestyle and future development (STCA)
Subject site is close proximity to major selling land estates
Close to proposed schools creational facilities and parks.
Call Harry Brar on 0413 585 759

Description:
The home with it all
Located in the well sought-after Pasadena estate, this quality built Dennis Family home has features galore with nothing to do but move in and enjoy. Sure to impress the most particular of buyers, the functional floorplan boasts two separate living areas, a beautiful hostess kitchen and to top it off a fantastic entertainers area outside!
Features include:
- Generous Master bedroom including walk in robe with Stegbar wardrobe system and ensuite
- Two more large bedrooms both with built in robes
- Open plan living with central kitchen and dining area
- Hostess kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dual dishwasher, Caesar stone benchtop, gas cooktop, porcelain tiling and walk in pantry with auto lighting
- Large separate family living area
- Stunning Laundry which also combines great functionality – ample storage space and two built in wardrobes
- Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout the home
- Undercover Entertainers area complete with JBL speaker system, outdoor infrared heaters, Flatscreen T.V, colour changing downlights and outdoor fan
- Generous backyard for the kids and pets to play
- Double remote garage
- Other features include: Opticomm Fibre to the Home, ample TV & Network points in all rooms, Ceiling fans to all bedrooms and front lounge, 1.5kw Solar system, LED lighting throughout home, Security camera system and potential Side access due to corner block
Pasadena estate is the place to be due to a true family friendly lifestyle. Beautiful children's parks and walking tracks offer plenty of space to explore, Casey fields and Casey RACE are only a stone throw away and all this is only a moment's drive to local schools. Not to mention the property is also just a short walk to Shopping on Clyde and bus routes 796 & 897!
To escape the rat race and start enjoying this great home please be quick to call Simon Murphy or Vineal Raj!
Insights: 10 Hill Farm Drive, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Pasadena
Only 3 years young and with the feel and finish of a display home, this 4 bedroom, plus study and home theatre Porter Davis is hard to fault! Perfect for first home buyers, investors, families or downsizers, - this home has something for everyone! Presentation is impeccable, immediately upon arrival, you are greeted with a landscaped front garden and grass area complimenting the modern façade and wide frontage.
Immediately once you enter, quality is rest assured with 9ft Ceilings, wide hallways, high quality carpet to bedrooms and home theatre with timber look flooring flowing through the entry and living areas. The fantastic kitchen is a focal point, 900mm cooker, range hood, D/W, quality S/S appliances all complimenting the 40 mm waterfall stone benchtop and glass splashback. The walk-in pantry is great for all kitchen lovers, ample in size with abundant cupboard and storage space. The open plan family / dining area features large oversized windows allowing for natural sunlight to flood in all year round.
The master suite includes impressive private ensuite with heated towel rails and a WIR. The second bedroom features an additional ensuite perfect for guests or teenagers and the two remaining bedrooms include BIR and are serviced by the modern main bathroom. Outdoors offers a decked alfresco area, plenty of plush green grass, vegie patch, fruit trees and privacy. A great space to make your own, keep simple and with low maintenance.
Features include, but are not limited to; 98% efficient hydronic heating, evaporative cooling, park directly across the road, close to shops, private and public schools, public transport and all amenities.
Avoid the hassle of building and move straight into this magnificent home in a breeze.
Insights: 15 Pasadena Boulevard, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 136 other 4 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.

Description:
Central to everything!
Location doesn't get much better than this- and we proudly present to you this immaculate family home that has been so nicely finished- there is not a thing to do! Whether you are looking for your first home, to downsize or invest- this home will appeal to you. Featuring:
- 3 spacious bedrooms- master with walk in robe and en-suite
- Modern entertainers kitchen fitted with quality appliances
- Open plan meals/family room plus upstairs study nook
- Large undercover outdoor entertaining area with low maintenance garden
Extra features include: single garage with internal access which has been cleverly converted into a second living zone but could easily be changed back to a functional garage, heating, air conditioning, generous size backyard which has been beautifully landscaped and so much more! Just a minutes' walk from the new Shopping On Clyde precinct and nearby to quality schools, parks and public transport. This one will not last long- for your private inspection, call today!

Description:
Be Inspired
From the moment you walk into the grand, wide entrance you will truly feel at home in this spectacular 3 year old Inspired Homes residence. Cleverly designed, and immaculately presented and maintained, you have the feeling of brand new without the wait or the headache. With 4 bedrooms, and a smart combination of formal and informal living, including theatre room, this one ticks all the boxes.
The sizable master suite leads into a lavish ensuite with oversized shower featuring triple shower heads, double stone vanity and quality fixtures and fittings. Complemented by a walk-in robe and grand double-door entry. Remaining 3 bedrooms are all well-proportioned, 2 with built-in robes and 1 with walk-in robe, all sharing a central family bathroom and powder room.
3 separate living zones gives you the option of family time together, or quiet time apart with a kids play zone cleverly located at the rear of the home. Socialise in the central, open plan kitchen, dining and living area, or hide away in the private, enclosed theatre room.
The kitchen is an entertainers delight with huge island bench featuring 40mm waterfall stone and stunning double under-mount sink. Quality Smeg appliances including stylish 900mm free-standing stainless steel stove, and dishwasher.
Outside youll find an outdoor entertaining area, newly seeded lawns, and the very rare bonus of a wide, gated, side access with parking for the boat, caravan or trailer.
Packed with additional features including high ceilings, ducted heating and cooling, quality fixtures and fittings throughout and the bonus of a huge oversized garage with ample space for cars plus storage.
Please note: Photo ID is required for all inspections

Description:
Country Style & Sophistication
A property that offers an enviable rural, secluded lifestyle with all the equestrian facilities you'll need for training or agistment, yet close to a suburban infra-structure is not always attainable. An opportunity now prevails to make this stunning 26 acre property your own. With a well-considered renovation and extension of the original home and constructed with the best quality fixtures and fittings, but still maintaining comfort, relaxed family living and flexibility it is sure appeal to the most fastidious buyers.
An impressive façade with well-maintained gardens and wrap around verandah sets the scene. Features:
- Large master suite with views, huge walk-in robe plus sliding robes
- Full ensuite with large frameless shower and separate toilet
- Three further bedrooms (all with walk-in robes and one with ensuite) in a separate wing with an adjoining rumpus room and family bathroom
- Spacious living areas comprising open plan family room with a split system opening to an fully enclosed alfresco area with built-in shelving, rangehood and stacker doors and stunning views to the gardens beyond
- The kitchen is an entertainer's delight with stone benchtops, 900mm oven, gas hot plates and built-in plumbing for fridge
- Behind the kitchen the butler's pantry is huge and has a Miele dishwasher and Bosch oven complete with appliance cupboards and pantry with roller doors
- Dining room or family room with wood heater, split system and bi-fold windows to the alfresco area
- The huge home office /study is located conveniently at the front of the home
- Large media room or 5th bedroom
- Spacious laundry with stone benchtops, plenty of cupboard space and room for 2 washing machines & ducted vacuum
- Sparkling Wormy Chestnut timber floors and 9ft ceilings throughout
- Double remote garage
The exterior of the property has beautifully maintained gardens with full equine facilities including:
- 6 indoor stables and 6 outdoor stables
- 14 paddocks (13 with shelters, 6 double & 7 single)
- 600 metre circular sand racetrack
- 8 horse walker machine & round yard
- 2 outdoor tie-up bays
- Wash bay
- 9m x 24m shed for horse floats and machinery
- 6m x 12m shed for storage
- 2 x 22,000 litre watertanks
- Woodshed
- Galavanised fencing throughout the property
Only 10 minutes to the heart of Cranbourne and all the schools and services it has to offer, 3 minutes to the South Gippsland Highway. What are you waiting for? Inspection is by appointment only.
Insights: 395 Yallambee Road, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017.

Description:
WHAT A BEAUTY!
CLYDE: Its all about location and lifestyle with this beautiful property that promises low maintenance living, combined with a prestige position in the established Pasadena Estate.
This quality Porter Davis built home features three spacious bedrooms plus an open study! The master bedroom is completed with a built in robe, en-suite and a ceiling fan. Bedrooms 2 & 3 have double sliding doors and are in close proximity to the family bathroom, with extra bath and shower facilities. Downstairs offers a powder room which is ideal for guests.
The open plan kitchen offers ample cupboard space, stone bench tops, glass splash back and a great size pantry.
This magnificent property is a low maintenance, manicured block and is placed within a short stroll from popular parks, shops and schools. This beautiful proportioned home offers a lifestyle of convenience and quietude.
Summary of Internal and External features:
- Built in 2014 by Porter Davis
- Study nook
- Open plan living and dining area
- Powder room
- Master with full en-suite and BIR
- Ducted heating
- Air conditioner
- Caesar stone bench tops in the kitchen
- LED down lights
- Quality flooring
- 600mm Oven
- 600mm Gas cook top
- Glass splash back
- Dishwasher
- Spacious built in pantry
- High ceiling
- Ceiling fan
- Remote controlled garage with internal access
- Sliding doors into outdoor area
- Low maintenance backyard
This property is situated within a short drive to freeway access and all major amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne and also only minuted away from the popular Clyde Primary school, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre along with Casey Sports Centre!
*BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW!!!*
* PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*

Description:
3 ACRES of POTENTIAL!
This is the ultimate property for any buyer that likes to make money!!! Within the Urban Growth Zone, this property ticks every box whether you're looking for a quiet slice of country life and/or secure your financial future with the possibility of subdivision and development (STCA)! The house itself has 4 generous sized bedrooms, large central bathroom, stunning renovated kitchen (Dishwasher), multiple living zones including lounge with Coonara style wood fire, dining plus large rumpus which leads you out to the pergola perfect for entertaining family & friends looking out to your perfectly flat and useable land. In addition to the secure house yard keeping pets & kids safely contained, there's a pony paddock with shelter and ample shedding consisting of 9mx7m garage/workshop, 18.3mx8.6m shed which was stables & could easily be reverted plus 13m x 12m drive through dry storage perfect for caravan/trailers & the like. Properties like this are rare as hen's teeth & with the urban sprawl on it's way you best be quick to claim it for your own!

Description:
Ex display private oasis
Situated in the Pasadena Estate this wonderful double storey ex display home combines display level quality, luxury appointments with a functional floorplan to suit a multitude of buyers.
This is a home offers the best of everything and is flawlessly presented.
Ground Level:
- Formal lounge upon entry
- Open plan consisting spacious meals and separate family room.
- Kitchen with ample storage space & separate butler's pantry
- Caesar stone bench tops, Stainless appliances, dishwasher & built in microwave.
- Convertible study / 4th bedroom
- Separate powder room.
Level one:
- Master bedroom with en-suite and large walk in wardrobe & private balcony.
- Two spacious bedrooms all with walk in robes.
- Central bathroom with separate toilet.
- Rumpus room or children's retreat area.
Backyard:
- Spectacular gas heated in-ground pool
- Timber decked alfresco, perfect for those who love entertaining
- Built In BBQ & landscaped gardens.
Extra features:
Down lights, high ceilings, ceiling fans, double garage with internal access, refrigerated cooling & ducted heating, double glazed windows throughout.
Situated near local parks & shopping with easy access to the local Casey Fields sporting complex, Casey Race aquatics centre and central Cranbourne you couldn't ask for more. For further information or to arrange an inspection please call Mark Sewell or Paul Khatchadorian on the listed numbers.

Description:
Time to Invest
CLYDE--PASADENA CLYDE
Currently leased till October 2017...This is perfect home to collect rent with a super quality tenants for a few months and then eventually move in or just add this to your rental portfolio..the choice is yours.
Competitively priced and absolute value for money.
On a low maintenance manicured block this home is placed a short stroll from popular parks, shops and schools, this beautifully proportioned home offers a lifestyle of convenience and quietude.
The house offers three generous sized bedrooms, a study nook, open plan kitchen with bench tops, family & meals area, a hidden laundry, powder room and two bathrooms.
The master bedroom has a walk in robe and Ensuite is sleek and modern. The other two bedrooms have built in robes.
One of the other great attributes is that the home has a easy manageable size backyard with plenty of room to have small pets with nearby parks which will allow kids running around playing ball games. Good size single garage with remote and internal access.
Ducted heating and split system cooling.
Created by well known developers Villawood, Pasadena Clyde is designed around open outdoor areas creating an innovative, greener lifestyle. A uniquely planned community, this terrific estate will cater to your every need. You will have no trouble in creating the perfect work-life balance with the extensive parkland, multiple playgrounds catering for all childrens ages, interconnected walking/bike tracks and sporting grounds!
Within a short drive to freeway access and all amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne this sensational opportunity is only minutes away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre!

Situated in the well sought after Pasadena Estate in Clyde is this stunning two story home with all the bells and whistles, opposite parkland and close to Casey fields sporting complex, schools and shopping on Clyde this is the perfect family home and can be all yours. Featuring;
- Four Large bedrooms, master with ensuite and its own private balcony.
- Four living areas including font formal lounge, kitchen family meals area, rumpus room and a kids retreat/lounge upstairs.
- Outdoor undercover entertaining area with built in kitchen and timber decking for year round entertaining.

Other features and benefits of this amazing family home are, a gas log fire place to the front formal lounge, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and also a split system to the family room, quality blinds and light fittings throughout, a large garage with enough space to fit three cars and landscaped gardens. Don't miss out on this one, this property is special! Call O'Brien Real Estate today.

Description:
QUARTER ACRE GEM
Offering the best of both worlds in a private location within the sought-after township of Clyde but still just a short drive to Cranbourne Shopping precinct and all other amenities.
- This desirable 4-bedroom home offers a full en-suite to the master bedroom & a 3-year-old main bathroom.
- The functional kitchen boasts a 900mm stainless steel oven, dishwasher & centre island and opens to a family/meals area.
- The lounge is a decent size with open fire place & built in bookcase. The home offers refrigerated cooling and gas ducted heating.
- Outside is a dream for those with lots of toys or business pursuits. There is a long driveway with access to either accommodation for 6 cars or currently for 4 with a dream man cave or office space at the rear.
The rear yard has a BBQ area, a pizza oven & beautiful gazebo plus above ground pool. Ideal for the growing family or perhaps for future development STCA or any relevant authority. All this on just over a quarter acre of land.

Description:
Magnificent Metricon - Clyde Beauty
Only a year young featuring beautiful finishes and a modern colour scheme is this 3 bedroom home! Perfect for first home buyers, investors, families or downsizers - this home has something for everyone! The fantastic kitchen is a focal point, with 900mm cooker a rangehood, D/W, quality S/S appliances, stone benches and plenty of bench and cupboard space. The walk in pantry is great for all kitchen lovers and massive in size. Open to the light filled family area and living room. The master suite includes impressive private ensuite and a WIR. The two remaining bedrooms include BIR and are serviced by the modern main bathroom.
Outdoors offers a deck pergola area, plenty of plush green grass and privacy. A great space to make your own, keep simple and with low maintenance.
Features include but are not limited to; evaporative cooling, ducted heating, plantation shutters & timber look flooring.
Close proximity to freeway access, private and public schools, public transport and all amenities.
Avoid the hassle of building and move straight into this magnificent home in a breeze.

Description:
TITLED 590m2 ALLOTMENT
PASADENA ESTATE (CLYDE): Searching for the perfect location to build your dream home? Looking for an estate designed with comfort and style in mind? Requiring a titled parcel of land? Wanting a vendor who is very motivated to sell? YOUR WISH IS MY COMMAND!!!
Privately situated in the highly sought after Pasadena Estate in Clyde, this well located premium land site measures approx. 590m2, with a total frontage of approx. 26.97 and a depth of approx. 30m. The land will provide plenty of scope to design and build your ideal floor plan. The location is ideal for those who are in need of side access for a boat, caravan or a trailer.
LAND BASICS:
SIZE: Approx. 590sqm
TOTAL FRONTAGE: Approx. 26.97m
DEPTH: Approx. 30m
Pasadena Estate is a place where rest and play are always nearby. In close proximity to a wealth of amenities and recreation facilities, the area is never short of adventure.

Description:
Pasadena magic...
Located in the Pasadena estate awaits this fantastic opportunity for one lucky purchaser. Now whether you're a family, first home buyer, investor or looking to down size then look no more because this property ticks all the boxes. Boasting:
- Three stunning sized bedrooms master with semi ensuite.
- An open planned kitchen meals area overlooks the family room.
- A double car lock up garage with single car rear access and internal access to the property.
Now with heating and cooling this home does offer you the very best for Melbourne's forever changing weather. Situated across the from the local park this property allows you to enjoy everything at your front door with the local Casey Fields sporting complex, Casey Race aquatics center, local shops and public transport what more could you want when searching for a property. Don't wait call today...
Insights: 10 Grampian Way, Clyde VIC 3978 was last sold in 2017 and 43 other 3 bedroom house in Clyde have recently been sold.
